data.text:
The day after signing a contract with Mejiro Ramonu. 
I was so ecstatic that I had forgot to exchange contact 
information with her, so I went looking for her.

choices.text: (I want to discuss what comes next!)

data.processed:
<story>The day after signing a contract with Mejiro Ramonu. 
<story>I was so ecstatic that I had forgot to exchange contact 
<story>information with her, so I went looking for her.

data.text:
The dream I wanted to pursue with her just wouldn't 
leave my mind. That race, and that race……I tried to 
suppress my excitement as I went around searching――
data.processed:
<story>The dream I wanted to pursue with her just wouldn't 
<story>leave my mind. That race, and that race……I tried to 
<story>suppress my excitement as I went around searching――

data.text:
――Or at least I tried……for some reason, I couldn't find 
her at all. And that continued on in to the next day……
data.processed:
<story>――Or at least I tried……for some reason, I couldn't find 
<story>her at all. And that continued on in to the next day……

data.text: And the next day――
data.processed: <story>And the next day――

data.text: And the next――
data.processed: <story>And the next――

data.text:
Maybe it was just a twist of fate, but I couldn't find Mejiro 
Ramonu at all. It was a day off, but I entered the gym thinking 
she was training but――as expected, she wasn't here.
data.processed:
<story>Maybe it was just a twist of fate, but I couldn't find Mejiro 
<story>Ramonu at all. It was a day off, but I entered the gym thinking 
<story>she was training but――as expected, she wasn't here.

data.text: Excuse me……are you looking for my older sister?
data.processed: <story>Excuse me……are you looking for my older sister?

data.text: I'm Mejiro Ardan. Nee-sama――……Mejiro Ramonu's little sister.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>I'm Mejiro Ardan. Nee-sama――……Mejiro Ramonu's little sister.

data.text:
You're my older sister's trainer, right? 
I've heard about it from the people at home.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>You're my older sister's trainer, right? 
<story>I've heard about it from the people at home.

data.text:
If you're looking for my older sister, then I might have an 
idea where she is. Around this time……I'm almost certain.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>If you're looking for my older sister, then I might have an 
<story>idea where she is. Around this time……I'm almost certain.

data.text:
O-of course. 
……But…… would it be alright for me to go with you?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>O-of course. 
<story>……But…… would it be alright for me to go with you?

data.text:
The place that Mejiro Ardan took me was――the race track. 
The entire venue was filled with excitement for today's Main Race.
data.processed:
<story>The place that Mejiro Ardan took me was――the race track. 
<story>The entire venue was filled with excitement for today's Main Race.

data.text:
No, Nee-sama always likes to pick a spot close to the turf. 
Most likely, right around……Ah.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>No, Nee-sama always likes to pick a spot close to the turf. 
<story>Most likely, right around……Ah.

data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……

data.text:
I hesitated to speak to her since she was staring 
so intently out at the turf…… Then, the fanfare 
to signal the beginning of the race rang out.
data.processed:
<story>I hesitated to speak to her since she was staring 
<story>so intently out at the turf…… Then, the fanfare 
<story>to signal the beginning of the race rang out.

data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……――

data.text:
From the start, she concentrated on the race, 
never turning her eyes away……It was like she 
was completely absorbed in to the world of racing.
data.processed:
<story>From the start, she concentrated on the race, 
<story>never turning her eyes away……It was like she 
<story>was completely absorbed in to the world of racing.

data.text:
Her cheeks were flushed and her eyes were sparkling as 
she looked out on the turf. There was none of the intimidating 
aura or presence from before, it was almost like――
data.processed:
<story>Her cheeks were flushed and her eyes were sparkling as 
<story>she looked out on the turf. There was none of the intimidating 
<story>aura or presence from before, it was almost like――

data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……――

data.text:
The cheers grew even louder. As the race entered 
the final straight, the competition grew more intense. 
I was drawn in instantly, before I realized it――
data.processed:
<story>The cheers grew even louder. As the race entered 
<story>the final straight, the competition grew more intense. 
<story>I was drawn in instantly, before I realized it――

data.text: ――So you like it.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>――So you like it.

data.text:
I was soaking it all in while looking at the goal board…… 
Mejiro Ramonu had suddenly spoken, probably to herself.

choices.text: You must really like races too
You must really like races too

data.processed:
<story>I was soaking it all in while looking at the goal board…… 
<story>Mejiro Ramonu had suddenly spoken, probably to herself.

data.text: No.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>No.

data.text: I love them.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>I love them.

data.text:
Aah, after all……isn't that right? How it sets your heart 
aflame, so intensely……The heat. The ache. The joy……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Aah, after all……isn't that right? How it sets your heart 
<story>aflame, so intensely……The heat. The ache. The joy……

data.text:
The one thing……that drives me. 
Only races――My love.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>The one thing……that drives me. 
<story>Only races――My love.

data.text:
Preparing for those days, with a perfect arrangement……Uma 
Musume who pour their all in to their running. The sound of 
feet digging in to the ground, reverberating through the soul――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Preparing for those days, with a perfect arrangement……Uma 
<story>Musume who pour their all in to their running. The sound of 
<story>feet digging in to the ground, reverberating through the soul――

data.text:
The frantic breath all around, an intensity palpable to the skin, 
the sound of a beating heart. The overwhelming cheers coming 
from across the fence. Shouting, expectations, excitement……――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>The frantic breath all around, an intensity palpable to the skin, 
<story>the sound of a beating heart. The overwhelming cheers coming 
<story>from across the fence. Shouting, expectations, excitement……――

data.text:
Using only your own body to compete, seeking the glory 
of victory…… All of it, is absolutely irresistible.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Using only your own body to compete, seeking the glory 
<story>of victory…… All of it, is absolutely irresistible.

data.text:
And what is born from that, is a gem of a race…… 
Offerring up such a perfect, complete victory……is proof of my love.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>And what is born from that, is a gem of a race…… 
<story>Offerring up such a perfect, complete victory……is proof of my love.

data.text: In addition to that――that means the Triple Tiara, doesn't it?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>In addition to that――that means the Triple Tiara, doesn't it?

data.text:
I reacted involuntarily. She was also aiming for the Triple Tiara…… 
It seems like my intuition at the time was not wrong.
data.processed:
<story>I reacted involuntarily. She was also aiming for the Triple Tiara…… 
<story>It seems like my intuition at the time was not wrong.

data.text:
…… 
And so……Ardan.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>…… 
<story>And so……Ardan.

data.text: Ah, yes……?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Ah, yes……?

data.text:
Who is this? 
Yours?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Who is this? 
<story>Yours?

data.text:
N-nee-sama……they're your trainer. 
You formed a contract, didn't you?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>N-nee-sama……they're your trainer. 
<story>You formed a contract, didn't you?

data.text:
……Aah. 
You, are the preparations for a debut coming along?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>……Aah. 
<story>You, are the preparations for a debut coming along?

data.text:
Not necessary. 
Just take care of the preparations, please.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Not necessary. 
<story>Just take care of the preparations, please.

data.text:
Ah, Nee-sama……! 
……Um, Trainer-san.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Ah, Nee-sama……! 
<story>……Um, Trainer-san.

data.text:
It was quite a shock that I had been forgotten…… 
But like this, I understood her love of races and her 
dream. These were the first steps to building trust.
data.processed:
<story>It was quite a shock that I had been forgotten…… 
<story>But like this, I understood her love of races and her 
<story>dream. These were the first steps to building trust.

data.text:
……Um. Would it be alright to ask you something? Trainer-san, 
what happened that led to you forming a contract with my older sister?
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>……Um. Would it be alright to ask you something? Trainer-san, 
<story>what happened that led to you forming a contract with my older sister?

data.text:
After watching her race, I immediately went 
chasing after her. She told me that I was the 
first so she signed……that's what I explained.
data.processed:
<story>After watching her race, I immediately went 
<story>chasing after her. She told me that I was the 
<story>first so she signed……that's what I explained.

data.text: ……As I thought.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>……As I thought.

data.text:
Truthfully……Trainer-san isn't the first one to ask. 
The people that formed a contract with my sister――
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Truthfully……Trainer-san isn't the first one to ask. 
<story>The people that formed a contract with my sister――
